3.title: Police Academy
3.actors: Steve Guttenberg, Kim Cattrall, G.W. Bailey, Bubba Smith
3.plot: A group of good-hearted but incompetent misfits enter the police academy, but the instructors there are not going to put up with their pranks.

4.title: Spaceballs
4.actors: Mel Brooks, John Candy, Rick Moranis, Bill Pullman
4.plot: Planet Spaceball's President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal Planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own, and only Lone Starr can stop them.

5.title: Top Gun
5.actors: Tom Cruise, Kelly McGillis, Val Kilmer, Anthony Edwards
5.plot: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

6.title: Mission: Impossible
6.actors: Tom Cruise, Jon Voight, Emmanuelle BÃ©art, Henry Czerny
6.plot: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

7.title: Jaws
7.actors: Roy Scheider, Robert Shaw, Richard Dreyfuss, Lorraine Gary
7.plot: When a gigantic great white shark begins to menace the small island community of Amity, a police chief, a marine scientist and grizzled fisherman set out to stop it.
